t: What does the 'this item contains a gift' option mean which appears during the purchase of any product on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): It means Amazon is asking you if the order you are trying to place, contains a gift for someone. If you are ordering something and there is a product in the order, which is a gift for someone, you can select the option ‘this will be a gift’ and proceed to check-out.

t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: Once you click the add to cart button, you should see a phrase that says " this order contains a gift". Place a check mark in the box. The next page will allow you to select which items in your shopping cart you would like gift wrapped. You will have the option for including a gift receipt ...

t: Do Amazon gifts show the sender? - Quora
s: Answer: I sometimes receive gift items via Amazon without knowing who sent them to me. If you want to let your recipient know that you were the sender you should designate the order as a gift and include your name in the gift note.
